Detailed Description

This helper class manages debug line drawing.

You can add single coloured lines to the list and it will take care of rendering them at an appropriate time.

void LineHelper::drawLine ( const Vector3 &  start,
const Vector3 &  end,
Moo::PackedColour  colour = 0xffffffff,
uint32  life = 0 
)

This method adds a world space line to the list and potentially draws it if the buffer has reached its limit.

Parameters:
start The start of the line
end The end of the line
colour The colour of the line as a 32 bit ARGB value
life The amount of frames to draw this line.
